product_name: Hugger Mugger Henna Print Yoga Mat
long_description: The Hugger Mugger Henna Print yoga mat has a durable, nonslip surface that lets you go deep into poses. Antimicrobial properties are built-in to help control odors; wash the Hugger Mugger Henna Print mat by hand with mild dish soap and water. Polyvinyl chloride (PVC) mat does not contain latex, phthalates or heavy metals.
short_description: The Hugger Mugger Henna Print yoga mat has a durable, nonslip surface that lets you go deep into poses.
